head.title: Executives to Teach Course In Communications

hedline.hl1: Executives to Teach Course In Communications

abstract.p: Executives from companies such as Texaco, Citicorp and International Business Machines will teach all courses in new master's degree program in management communications at Manhattanville College in Purchase, NY (S)

block.p: Executives from companies like Texaco, Citicorp and International Business Machines will teach all the courses in a new master's degree program in management communications offered by Manhattanville College in Purchase.

The 36-credit program will run on Saturdays and Sundays to accommodate those who work full time. Each course will meet three weekends a semester, beginning on Sept. 9, said Andrea J. Covell, the assistant dean of the School of Graduate and Professional Studies. ''We haven't found any other program dealing with management communications in the local area,'' she said.

Each credit costs $435, and there is an activity fee for the first course. An open house will be held on Thursday at the college.
